<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghostshot Wrapping](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1228)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 184 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a ranged weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt a ranged Strike with the affixed weapon while [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) or [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39).

 
</row>

</column>

---

This long strip of linen is tightly wound around the barrel of the affixed firearm or the grip of a bow. When activated, the talisman's magic dampens the sound of the triggering shot, rendering it completely silent, and additionally skews the angle of the shot, so it appears to come from a different location and direction than your actual position. You don't become automatically observed to any creatures due to making the triggering Strike.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ghostshot Wrapping
